content: I'm moving IVT to a new file topology.algebra.ordered.intermediate_value. If you want to be listed as an author in the copyright header, please reply here. git blame attributes most lines to me and @Alistair Tucker.

I did wonder about all those [ne_bot l]s. Where I see them in this file they are mostly being provided explicitly but as it's a typeclass argument a lot of underscores result. I didn't really understand the point. But maybe it's a consequence of some broader design decision whose parameters I am unaware of.
I don't want to change any code in this PR.
I can look at [ne_bot l] parameters after this one is merged into master.
